amber_token.name: Amber API Token
amber_token.description: Get this from Amber → Settings → Developer.

station_id.name: Sigen Station ID
station_id.description: 15-digit Station ID. In MySigen: ask Sigen AI Assistant "What is my Station ID?"

sigen_user.name: Sigen Email
sigen_user.description: Email address for your Sigen account (optional if you use a bearer or encrypted password).

sigen_password.name: Sigen Password
sigen_password.description: Plain password (optional). Not used unless we add an on-start login helper.

sigen_pass_enc.name: Sigen Password (Encrypted Blob)
sigen_pass_enc.description: Preferred: encrypted password blob for Sigen auth.

sigen_bearer.name: Sigen Bearer Token
sigen_bearer.description: Alternative to password: paste a valid token.

sigen_device_id.name: Sigen Device ID (optional)
sigen_device_id.description: Specific device to update. If empty, upstream default behavior applies.

interval.name: Update Interval (minutes)
interval.description: Default 30 min (Sigen currently supports 30 min; 5-min is sent but may be ignored)

advanced.name: Price Type
advanced.description: Choose which Amber price band to use: low / predicted / high.

use_current.name: Use Current Prices
use_current.description: Include the current interval price in the plan.

dry_run.name: Dry Run
dry_run.description: Fetch and compute but do not update the inverter.

tz_override.name: Timezone Override
tz_override.description: E.g. Australia/Sydney. Leave blank to auto-detect.

align.name: Price Alignment
align.description: If supported by upstream: align to start or end of interval.

mqtt_enabled.name: MQTT Status Sensor
mqtt_enabled.description: Publish running/valid/failed status via MQTT discovery.

mqtt_username.name: MQTT Username
mqtt_username.description: Leave blank if your broker doesn't require it.

mqtt_password.name: MQTT Password
mqtt_password.description: Leave blank if your broker doesn't require it.
